title: Lots of URDF parsing warnings when using sdformat

content.raw:
When building sdformat/sdf-1.4 + gazebo/gazebo_1.9 + drcsim/rml, there are lots of warnings from parsing the URDF (below is a sample from launching `atlas_utils/vrc_task_1.launch`).  Everything seems to work fine, so these warnings should be removed.

I'm not sure whether the fix belongs in drcsim or in sdformat.

~~~
Warning [parser.cc:358] No <sdf> element in file[/home/gerkey/code/drc/install/share/drcsim-2.6/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas_sandia_hands/atlas_sandia_hands.urdf]
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<sensor name="right_palm_stereo_camera" type="multicamera"><update_rate>30.0</update_rate><camera name="left"><horizontal_fov>1.25663706144</horizontal_fov><image><width>752</width><height>480</height><format>L8</format></image><clip><near>0.02</near><far>100</far></clip><noise><type>gaussian</type><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>0.007</stddev></noise></camera><camera name="right"><pose>0 -0.04 0 0 0 0</pose><horizontal_fov>1.25663706144</horizontal_fov><image><width>752</width><height>480</height><format>L8</format></image><clip><near>0.02</near><far>100</far></clip><noise><type>gaussian</type><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>0.007</stddev></noise></camera><plugin filename="libgazebo_ros_multicamera.so" name="stereo_camera_controller"><alwaysOn>true</alwaysOn><updateRate>0.0</updateRate><cameraName>sandia_hands/r_hand/camera</cameraName><imageTopicName>image_raw</imageTopicName><cameraInfoTopicName>camera_info</cameraInfoTopicName><frameName>right_palm_left_camera_optical_frame</frameName><hackBaseline>0.04</hackBaseline><distortionK1>0.0</distortionK1><distortionK2>0.0</distortionK2><distortionK3>0.0</distortionK3><distortionT1>0.0</distortionT1><distortionT2>0.0</distortionT2></plugin></sensor>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<plugin filename="libContactModelPlugin.so" name="sandia_contact_plugin"><contact><collision>r_hand::r_hand_collision_right_palm</collision><collision>r_hand::r_hand_collision_right_palm_1</collision><collision>r_hand::r_hand_collision_right_palm_3</collision><collision>r_hand::r_hand_collision_right_palm_4</collision><collision>r_hand::r_hand_collision_right_palm_5</collision><collision>right_f0_1::right_f0_1_collision</collision><collision>right_f0_2::right_f0_2_collision</collision><collision>right_f1_1::right_f1_1_collision</collision><collision>right_f1_2::right_f1_2_collision</collision><collision>right_f2_1::right_f2_1_collision</collision><collision>right_f2_2::right_f2_2_collision</collision><collision>right_f3_1::right_f3_1_collision</collision><collision>right_f3_2::right_f3_2_collision</collision></contact></plugin>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<sensor name="imu_sensor" type="imu"><always_on>1</always_on><update_rate>1000.0</update_rate><imu><noise><type>gaussian</type><rate><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>2e-4</stddev><bias_mean>0.0000075</bias_mean><bias_stddev>0.0000008</bias_stddev></rate><accel><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>1.7e-2</stddev><bias_mean>0.1</bias_mean><bias_stddev>0.001</bias_stddev></accel></noise></imu></sensor>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<sensor name="left_palm_stereo_camera" type="multicamera"><update_rate>30.0</update_rate><camera name="left"><horizontal_fov>1.25663706144</horizontal_fov><image><width>752</width><height>480</height><format>L8</format></image><clip><near>0.02</near><far>100</far></clip><noise><type>gaussian</type><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>0.007</stddev></noise></camera><camera name="right"><pose>0 -0.04 0 0 0 0</pose><horizontal_fov>1.25663706144</horizontal_fov><image><width>752</width><height>480</height><format>L8</format></image><clip><near>0.02</near><far>100</far></clip><noise><type>gaussian</type><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>0.007</stddev></noise></camera><plugin filename="libgazebo_ros_multicamera.so" name="stereo_camera_controller"><alwaysOn>true</alwaysOn><updateRate>0.0</updateRate><cameraName>sandia_hands/l_hand/camera</cameraName><imageTopicName>image_raw</imageTopicName><cameraInfoTopicName>camera_info</cameraInfoTopicName><frameName>left_palm_left_camera_optical_frame</frameName><hackBaseline>0.04</hackBaseline><distortionK1>0.0</distortionK1><distortionK2>0.0</distortionK2><distortionK3>0.0</distortionK3><distortionT1>0.0</distortionT1><distortionT2>0.0</distortionT2></plugin></sensor>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<plugin filename="libContactModelPlugin.so" name="sandia_contact_plugin"><contact><collision>l_hand::l_hand_collision_left_palm</collision><collision>l_hand::l_hand_collision_left_palm_1</collision><collision>l_hand::l_hand_collision_left_palm_3</collision><collision>l_hand::l_hand_collision_left_palm_4</collision><collision>l_hand::l_hand_collision_left_palm_5</collision><collision>left_f0_1::left_f0_1_collision</collision><collision>left_f0_2::left_f0_2_collision</collision><collision>left_f1_1::left_f1_1_collision</collision><collision>left_f1_2::left_f1_2_collision</collision><collision>left_f2_1::left_f2_1_collision</collision><collision>left_f2_2::left_f2_2_collision</collision><collision>left_f3_1::left_f3_1_collision</collision><collision>left_f3_2::left_f3_2_collision</collision></contact></plugin>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<sensor name="imu_sensor" type="imu"><always_on>1</always_on><update_rate>1000.0</update_rate><imu><noise><type>gaussian</type><rate><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>2e-4</stddev><bias_mean>0.0000075</bias_mean><bias_stddev>0.0000008</bias_stddev></rate><accel><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>1.7e-2</stddev><bias_mean>0.1</bias_mean><bias_stddev>0.001</bias_stddev></accel></noise></imu></sensor>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<pose>0 0 0.93 0 0 0</pose>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<plugin filename="libAtlasPlugin.so" name="atlas_plugin" />] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<plugin filename="libgazebo_ros_joint_trajectory.so" name="joint_trajectory_plugin"><topicName>joint_trajectory</topicName><updateRate>1000.0</updateRate></plugin>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<sensor name="imu_sensor" type="imu"><always_on>1</always_on><update_rate>1000.0</update_rate><imu><noise><type>gaussian</type><!-- Noise parameters from Boston Dynamics
               (http://gazebosim.org/wiki/Sensor_noise):
                 rates (rad/s): mean=0, stddev=2e-4
                 accels (m/s/s): mean=0, stddev=1.7e-2
                 rate bias (rad/s): 5e-6 - 1e-5
                 accel bias (m/s/s): 1e-1
               Experimentally, simulation provide rates with noise of
               about 1e-3 rad/s and accels with noise of about 1e-1 m/s/s.
               So we don't expect to see the noise unless number of inner iterations
               are increased.

               We will add bias.  In this model, bias is sampled once for rates
               and once for accels at startup; the sign (negative or positive)
               of each bias is then switched with equal probability.  Thereafter,
               the biases are fixed additive offsets.  We choose
               bias means and stddevs to produce biases close to the provided
               data. --><rate><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>2e-4</stddev><bias_mean>0.0000075</bias_mean><bias_stddev>0.0000008</bias_stddev></rate><accel><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>1.7e-2</stddev><bias_mean>0.1</bias_mean><bias_stddev>0.001</bias_stddev></accel></noise></imu></sensor>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<plugin filename="libgazebo_ros_p3d.so" name="gazebo_ros_p3d"><bodyName>pelvis</bodyName><topicName>/ground_truth_odom</topicName><alwaysOn>true</alwaysOn><updateRate>100.0</updateRate></plugin>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<sensor name="r_foot_contact_sensor" type="contact"><update_rate>1000.0</update_rate><always_on>1</always_on><contact><collision>r_foot_collision</collision><topic>/r_foot_contact</topic></contact></sensor>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<sensor name="l_foot_contact_sensor" type="contact"><update_rate>1000.0</update_rate><always_on>1</always_on><contact><collision>l_foot_collision</collision><topic>/l_foot_contact</topic></contact></sensor>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<plugin filename="libgazebo_ros_force.so" name="gazebo_ros_force"><bodyName>pelvis</bodyName><topicName>/atlas/apply_pelvis_force</topicName></plugin>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<sensor name="head_hokuyo_sensor" type="gpu_ray"><pose>0 0 0 0 0 0</pose><visualize>false</visualize><update_rate>40</update_rate><ray><scan><horizontal><samples>720</samples><resolution>1</resolution><min_angle>-1.570796</min_angle><max_angle>1.570796</max_angle></horizontal></scan><range><min>0.10</min><max>30.0</max><resolution>0.01</resolution></range><noise><type>gaussian</type><!-- Noise parameters based on published spec for Hokuyo laser
               achieving "+-30mm" accuracy at range < 10m.  A mean of 0.0m and
               stddev of 0.01m will put 99.7% of samples within 0.03m of the true
               reading. --><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>0.01</stddev></noise></ray><plugin filename="libgazebo_ros_gpu_laser.so" name="gazebo_ros_head_hokuyo_controller"><topicName>/multisense_sl/laser/scan</topicName><frameName>head_hokuyo_frame</frameName></plugin></sensor>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<sensor name="stereo_camera" type="multicamera"><!-- see MultiSenseSLPlugin.h for available modes --><update_rate>30.0</update_rate><camera name="left"><!-- Spec sheet says 80deg X 45deg @ 1024x544pix.  Based on feedback
             from teams, we're instead doing 80deg X 80deg @ 800x800pix. --><horizontal_fov>1.3962634</horizontal_fov><image><width>800</width><height>800</height><format>R8G8B8</format></image><clip><near>0.02</near><far>300</far></clip><noise><type>gaussian</type><!-- Noise is sampled independently per pixel on each frame.  
               That pixel's noise value is added to each of its color
               channels, which at that point lie in the range [0,1].
               The stddev value of 0.007 is based on experimental data 
               from a camera in a Sandia hand pointed at a static scene
               in a couple of different lighting conditions.  --><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>0.007</stddev></noise></camera><camera name="right"><pose>0 -0.07 0 0 0 0</pose><!-- Spec sheet says 80deg X 45deg @ 1024x544pix.  Based on feedback
             from teams, we're instead doing 80deg X 80deg @ 800x800pix. --><horizontal_fov>1.3962634</horizontal_fov><image><width>800</width><height>800</height><format>R8G8B8</format></image><clip><near>0.02</near><far>300</far></clip><noise><type>gaussian</type><!-- Noise is sampled independently per pixel on each frame.  
               That pixel's noise value is added to each of its color
               channels, which at that point lie in the range [0,1].
               The stddev value of 0.007 is based on experimental data 
               from a camera in a Sandia hand pointed at a static scene
               in a couple of different lighting conditions.  --><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>0.007</stddev></noise></camera><plugin filename="libgazebo_ros_multicamera.so" name="stereo_camera_controller"><alwaysOn>true</alwaysOn><updateRate>0.0</updateRate><cameraName>multisense_sl/camera</cameraName><imageTopicName>image_raw</imageTopicName><cameraInfoTopicName>camera_info</cameraInfoTopicName><frameName>left_camera_optical_frame</frameName><!--<rightFrameName>right_camera_optical_frame</rightFrameName>--><hackBaseline>0.07</hackBaseline><distortionK1>0.0</distortionK1><distortionK2>0.0</distortionK2><distortionK3>0.0</distortionK3><distortionT1>0.0</distortionT1><distortionT2>0.0</distortionT2></plugin></sensor>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<plugin filename="libMultiSenseSLPlugin.so" name="multisense_plugin" />] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<sensor name="head_imu_sensor" type="imu"><always_on>1</always_on><update_rate>1000.0</update_rate><imu><noise><type>gaussian</type><!-- Noise parameters from Boston Dynamics
               (http://gazebosim.org/wiki/Sensor_noise):
                 rates (rad/s): mean=0, stddev=2e-4
                 accels (m/s/s): mean=0, stddev=1.7e-2
                 rate bias (rad/s): 5e-6 - 1e-5
                 accel bias (m/s/s): 1e-1
               Experimentally, simulation provide rates with noise of
               about 1e-3 rad/s and accels with noise of about 1e-1 m/s/s.
               So we don't expect to see the noise unless number of inner iterations
               are increased.

               We will add bias.  In this model, bias is sampled once for rates
               and once for accels at startup; the sign (negative or positive)
               of each bias is then switched with equal probability.  Thereafter,
               the biases are fixed additive offsets.  We choose
               bias means and stddevs to produce biases close to the provided
               data. --><rate><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>2e-4</stddev><bias_mean>0.0000075</bias_mean><bias_stddev>0.0000008</bias_stddev></rate><accel><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>1.7e-2</stddev><bias_mean>0.1</bias_mean><bias_stddev>0.001</bias_stddev></accel></noise></imu></sensor>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<plugin filename="libSandiaHandPlugin.so" name="sandia_hand_plugin" />] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Warning [parser_urdf.cc:1976] urdf2sdf: link[left_palm_left_camera_optical_frame] has no inertia, parent joint [left_palm_left_camera_optical_frame_joint] ignored
.Warning [parser_urdf.cc:1981] urdf2sdf: link[left_palm_left_camera_optical_frame] has no inertia, not modeled in sdf
Warning [parser_urdf.cc:1976] urdf2sdf: link[left_palm_right_camera_optical_frame] has no inertia, parent joint [left_palm_right_camera_optical_frame_joint] ignored
.Warning [parser_urdf.cc:1981] urdf2sdf: link[left_palm_right_camera_optical_frame] has no inertia, not modeled in sdf

.Warning [parser_urdf.cc:1981] urdf2sdf: link[left_camera_optical_frame] has no inertia, not modeled in sdf
Warning [parser_urdf.cc:1976] urdf2sdf: link[right_camera_optical_frame] has no inertia, parent joint [right_camera_optical_frame_joint] ignored
.Warning [parser_urdf.cc:1981] urdf2sdf: link[right_camera_optical_frame] has no inertia, not modeled in sdf

.Warning [parser_urdf.cc:1981] urdf2sdf: link[right_palm_right_camera_optical_frame] has no inertia, not modeled in sdf
Warning [parser.cc:265] parse from urdf file [/home/gerkey/code/drc/install/share/drcsim-2.6/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas_sandia_hands/atlas_sandia_hands.urdf].

content.html:
When building sdformat/sdf-1.4 + gazebo/gazebo_1.9 + drcsim/rml, there are lots of warnings from parsing the URDF (below is a sample from launching atlas_utils/vrc_task_1.launch). Everything seems to work fine, so these warnings should be removed.

I'm not sure whether the fix belongs in drcsim or in sdformat.

Warning [parser.cc:358] No <sdf> element in file[/home/gerkey/code/drc/install/share/drcsim-2.6/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas_sandia_hands/atlas_sandia_hands.urdf]
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<sensor name="right_palm_stereo_camera" type="multicamera"><update_rate>30.0</update_rate><camera name="left"><horizontal_fov>1.25663706144</horizontal_fov><image><width>752</width><height>480</height><format>L8</format></image><clip><near>0.02</near><far>100</far></clip><noise><type>gaussian</type><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>0.007</stddev></noise></camera><camera name="right"><pose>0 -0.04 0 0 0 0</pose><horizontal_fov>1.25663706144</horizontal_fov><image><width>752</width><height>480</height><format>L8</format></image><clip><near>0.02</near><far>100</far></clip><noise><type>gaussian</type><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>0.007</stddev></noise></camera><plugin filename="libgazebo_ros_multicamera.so" name="stereo_camera_controller"><alwaysOn>true</alwaysOn><updateRate>0.0</updateRate><cameraName>sandia_hands/r_hand/camera</cameraName><imageTopicName>image_raw</imageTopicName><cameraInfoTopicName>camera_info</cameraInfoTopicName><frameName>right_palm_left_camera_optical_frame</frameName><hackBaseline>0.04</hackBaseline><distortionK1>0.0</distortionK1><distortionK2>0.0</distortionK2><distortionK3>0.0</distortionK3><distortionT1>0.0</distortionT1><distortionT2>0.0</distortionT2></plugin></sensor>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<plugin filename="libContactModelPlugin.so" name="sandia_contact_plugin"><contact><collision>r_hand::r_hand_collision_right_palm</collision><collision>r_hand::r_hand_collision_right_palm_1</collision><collision>r_hand::r_hand_collision_right_palm_3</collision><collision>r_hand::r_hand_collision_right_palm_4</collision><collision>r_hand::r_hand_collision_right_palm_5</collision><collision>right_f0_1::right_f0_1_collision</collision><collision>right_f0_2::right_f0_2_collision</collision><collision>right_f1_1::right_f1_1_collision</collision><collision>right_f1_2::right_f1_2_collision</collision><collision>right_f2_1::right_f2_1_collision</collision><collision>right_f2_2::right_f2_2_collision</collision><collision>right_f3_1::right_f3_1_collision</collision><collision>right_f3_2::right_f3_2_collision</collision></contact></plugin>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<sensor name="imu_sensor" type="imu"><always_on>1</always_on><update_rate>1000.0</update_rate><imu><noise><type>gaussian</type><rate><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>2e-4</stddev><bias_mean>0.0000075</bias_mean><bias_stddev>0.0000008</bias_stddev></rate><accel><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>1.7e-2</stddev><bias_mean>0.1</bias_mean><bias_stddev>0.001</bias_stddev></accel></noise></imu></sensor>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<sensor name="left_palm_stereo_camera" type="multicamera"><update_rate>30.0</update_rate><camera name="left"><horizontal_fov>1.25663706144</horizontal_fov><image><width>752</width><height>480</height><format>L8</format></image><clip><near>0.02</near><far>100</far></clip><noise><type>gaussian</type><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>0.007</stddev></noise></camera><camera name="right"><pose>0 -0.04 0 0 0 0</pose><horizontal_fov>1.25663706144</horizontal_fov><image><width>752</width><height>480</height><format>L8</format></image><clip><near>0.02</near><far>100</far></clip><noise><type>gaussian</type><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>0.007</stddev></noise></camera><plugin filename="libgazebo_ros_multicamera.so" name="stereo_camera_controller"><alwaysOn>true</alwaysOn><updateRate>0.0</updateRate><cameraName>sandia_hands/l_hand/camera</cameraName><imageTopicName>image_raw</imageTopicName><cameraInfoTopicName>camera_info</cameraInfoTopicName><frameName>left_palm_left_camera_optical_frame</frameName><hackBaseline>0.04</hackBaseline><distortionK1>0.0</distortionK1><distortionK2>0.0</distortionK2><distortionK3>0.0</distortionK3><distortionT1>0.0</distortionT1><distortionT2>0.0</distortionT2></plugin></sensor>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<plugin filename="libContactModelPlugin.so" name="sandia_contact_plugin"><contact><collision>l_hand::l_hand_collision_left_palm</collision><collision>l_hand::l_hand_collision_left_palm_1</collision><collision>l_hand::l_hand_collision_left_palm_3</collision><collision>l_hand::l_hand_collision_left_palm_4</collision><collision>l_hand::l_hand_collision_left_palm_5</collision><collision>left_f0_1::left_f0_1_collision</collision><collision>left_f0_2::left_f0_2_collision</collision><collision>left_f1_1::left_f1_1_collision</collision><collision>left_f1_2::left_f1_2_collision</collision><collision>left_f2_1::left_f2_1_collision</collision><collision>left_f2_2::left_f2_2_collision</collision><collision>left_f3_1::left_f3_1_collision</collision><collision>left_f3_2::left_f3_2_collision</collision></contact></plugin>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<sensor name="imu_sensor" type="imu"><always_on>1</always_on><update_rate>1000.0</update_rate><imu><noise><type>gaussian</type><rate><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>2e-4</stddev><bias_mean>0.0000075</bias_mean><bias_stddev>0.0000008</bias_stddev></rate><accel><mean>0.0</mean><stddev>1.7e-2</stddev><bias_mean>0.1</bias_mean><bias_stddev>0.001</bias_stddev></accel></noise></imu></sensor>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<pose>0 0 0.93 0 0 0</pose>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<plugin filename="libAtlasPlugin.so" name="atlas_plugin" />] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<plugin filename="libgazebo_ros_joint_trajectory.so" name="joint_trajectory_plugin"><topicName>joint_trajectory</topicName><updateRate>1000.0</updateRate></plugin>] not converted from URDF, probably already in SDF format.
Error [parser_urdf.cc:1235] extension [<sensor name="imu_sensor" type="imu"><always_on>1</always_on><update_rate>1000.0</update_rate><imu><noise><type>gaussian</type><!-- Noise parameters from Boston Dynamics
               (http://gazebosim.org/wiki/Sensor_noise):
                 rates (rad/s): mean=0, stddev=2e-4
                 accels (m/s/s): mean=0, stddev=1.7e-2
                 rate bias (rad/s): 5e-6 - 1e-5
                 accel bias (m/s/s): 1e-1
               Experimentally, simulation provide rates with noise of
               about 1e-3 rad/s and accels with noise of about 1e-1 m/s/s.
               So we don't expect to see the noise unless number of inner iterations
               are increased.

               We will add bias.  In this model, bias is sampled once for rates
               and once for accels at startup; the sign (negative or positive)
               of each bias is then switched with equal probability.  Thereafter,
